sections.pali: ‘‘Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ; Abhikkantena vaṇṇena, sabbā obhāsayaṃ disā’’ti.
‘‘Maṇḍūkohaṃ pure āsiṃ, udake vārigocaro; Tava dhammaṃ suṇantassa, avadhī vacchapālako.
‘‘Muhuttaṃ cittapasādassa, iddhiṃ passa yasañca me; Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me.
‘‘Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama; Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare’’ti. Maṇḍūkadevaputtavimānaṃ paṭhamaṃ.
